name: WorktreeComment
description: Post an Open workspace link on every new work item
author: worktree-io

inputs.name: token
inputs.label: Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure DevOps token used to post the comment. Defaults to the built-in `System.AccessToken`.

inputs.name: workItemId
inputs.label: Work Item ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID of the work item to comment on. Pass the ID forwarded by the service hook trigger.
